entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Ivujivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:57 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -18.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ivujivik Airport 09:21 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -18.0°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -20.2°C
Wind: SSE 39 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this morning then becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
